title: Pixel 4 : USB Port disabled (charging, usb transfer etc...)
content:
Hello everybody,

2 days ago , when I wanted to plug my Pixel 4 to my AC Charge (same as usual) it did not charge.
I tried another charging cable but same result.  When I tried again 3h later (only 1% battery remaining) it worked.
Today same issue I already tried 3 different cable and non of them work. I used to charge the phone on all those cable (1 at work, 1 at home etc...) and it always worked fine until 2 days ago.

I tried safe mode restart, developper mode , change cable, change socket etc... but nothing is working. A friend of mine borrowed me a wireless samsung station and it works but it is very slow.

I precise that I have the USB Preference page in "Settings" all greyed out.

Do you think about a solution for the issue ? Priority would be the charging issue ...

Regards,

BO
